about_the_game:
Strange events are happening in the magical world of Onomalia that are causing its destruction. "Atha: In search of the well” is a 2D platform adventure game narrated in the form of a cordel set with elements of northeastern culture, containing music in the baião style, woodcut cutscenes and captivating, lively and very creative gameplay art


With the garnisé chicken Atha, walk, jump, attack with your feather, collect items, cast magic, push boxes, press buttons and, with Bia's help, use levers to open new paths. In this way, help our hero Atha and his companion Bia to face the dangers of this journey and understand the magnitude of what is happening, to protect their homeland.

(Xbox controller)
Forward directional – Move forward
Reverse directional – Go backwards
A – Jump
X – Attack
Y – Change to Bia at the indicated location
B – Magic spear
RT (press and hold) – Pollinates blue flowers to trigger doors and bridges
RB + D-pad near a box – Pulls the box
D-pad near a box – Pushes the box
Start – Pause

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Adventure of the chicken Atha and his friend Bia, facing dangers to protect their homeland, using skills such as jumping, attacking and magic, as well as solving puzzles with boxes, buttons and levers.

English, Portuguese - Brazil*
